verses.verse: And <WG1161> he <WG2036> said unto <WG4314> his disciples <WG3101>, It is <WG2076> impossible <WG418> but <WG3361> that occasions of stumbling <WG4625> should come <WG2064>; but <WG1161> woe <WG3759> unto him <WG1223>, through whom <WG3739> they come <WG2064>!

But <WG1161> who <WG5101> is there of <WG1537> you <WG5216>, having <WG2192> a <WG2112> servant <WG1401> plowing <WG722> or <WG2228> keeping sheep <WG4165>, that will say <WG2046> unto <WG2112> him <WG3739>, when he is come <WG1525> in from <WG1537> the field <WG68>, Come <WG3928> straightway and sit down to meat <WG377>;

and <WG235> will <WG2046> not rather <WG3780> say <WG2046> unto him <WG846>, Make ready <WG2090> wherewith <WG5101> I may sup <WG1172>, and <WG2532> gird thyself <WG4024>, and serve <WG1247> me <WG3427>, till <WG2193> I have eaten <WG5315> and <WG2532> drunken <WG4095>; and <WG2532> afterward3326, Deuteronomy23 thou <WG4771> shalt eat <WG5315> and <WG2532> drink <WG4095>?
Doth he2192, 3361 thank <WG5485> the servant <WG1401> because <WG3754> he did <WG4160> the things that <WG1565> were commanded <WG1299>?

Even <WG2532> so <WG3779> ye <WG5210> also <WG3752>, when ye shall have done <WG4160> all <WG3956> the things that <WG3588> are commanded <WG1299> you <WG5213>, say <WG3004>, We are <WG2070> unprofitable <WG888> servants <WG3754>; we have done <WG4160> that which <WG3739> it <WG3754> was our duty <WG3784> to do <WG4160>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, as <WG1722> they <WG846> were on the way <WG4198> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>, that <WG2532> he <WG846> was passing <WG1330> along <WG1223> the borders <WG3319> of Samaria <WG4540> and <WG2532> Galilee <WG1056>.

And <WG2532> as he <WG846> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> a certain <WG5100> village <WG2968>, there met <WG528> him <WG846> ten <WG1176> men <WG435> that were lepers <WG3015>, who <WG3739> stood <WG2476> afar off <WG4207>:
and <WG2532> they <WG846> lifted up <WG142> their voices <WG5456>, saying <WG3004>, Jesus <WG2424>, Master <WG1988>, have mercy <WG1653> on us <WG2248>.

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036>, Were not <WG3780> the <WG2511> ten <WG1176> cleansed <WG2511>? but <WG1161> where <WG4226> are the nine <WG1767>?
Were <WG2147> there none <WG3756> found <WG2147> that returned <WG5290> to give <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to God <WG2316>, save1487, 3361 this <WG3778> stranger <WG241>?

And <WG1161> being asked <WG1905> by <WG5259> the Pharisees <WG5330>, when <WG4219> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> cometh <WG2064>, he answered <WG611> them <WG846> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, The kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> cometh <WG2064> not <WG3756> with <WG3326> observation <WG3907>:

for <WG1063> as <WG5618> the lightning <WG796>, when it lighteneth <WG797> out of <WG1537> the one <WG3588> part under <WG5259> the heaven <WG3772>, shineth <WG2989> unto <WG1519> the other <WG3588> part under <WG5259> heaven <WG3772>; so <WG3779> shall <WG2071> the <WG2532> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be <WG2071> in <WG1722> his <WG846> day <WG2250>.
But <WG1161> first <WG4412> must <WG1163> he <WG846> suffer <WG3958> many things <WG4183> and <WG2532> be rejected <WG593> of <WG575> this <WG3778> generation <WG1074>.

And <WG2532> as <WG2531> it came to pass <WG1096> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of Noah <WG3575>, even so <WG3779> shall it be <WG2071> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444>.

They ate <WG2068>, they drank <WG4095>, they married <WG1060>, they were given in marriage <WG1547>, until <WG891> the day <WG2250> that <WG3739> Noah <WG3575> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the ark <WG2787>, and <WG2532> the flood <WG2627> came <WG2064>, and <WG2532> destroyed <WG622> them all <WG537>.

Likewise <WG3668> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> it came to pass <WG1096> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of Lot <WG3091>; they ate <WG2068>, they drank <WG4095>, they bought <WG59>, they sold <WG4453>, they planted <WG5452>, they builded <WG3618>;

but <WG1161> in the day <WG2250> that <WG3739> Lot <WG3091> went <WG1831> out <WG575> from Sodom <WG4670> it rained <WG1026> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> brimstone <WG2303> from <WG575> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> destroyed <WG622> them all <WG537>:

<WG3739> Whosoever <WG1437> shall seek <WG2212> to gain <WG4982> his <WG846> life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it <WG846>: but <WG2532> whosoever <WG1437> shall <WG3739> lose <WG622> his life <WG846> shall preserve <WG2225> it <WG846>.
